testcase.name: To validate Login using Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Adactin login page.........................................passed When User enter valid Username and Password.................................passed And User enter Login button.................................................passed Then User must displayed with Successful Login..............................passed

testcase.name: To validate Hotel Booking functionality using valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Adactin login page.........................................passed And User enter "pavithra97" and "pavithra97" and click Login................passed When User is in Search page, user enter details for Search hotel............passed And User click Search button................................................passed Then user book the hotel by filling details "pavithra","chandar"and"chennai".passed And user pay the amount using "1234567887654321" and "123"..................passed And User click bookNow button and id number is generated....................passed
